description:
Zeda is convinced to join a rebel militia by a female soldier named Santana and they set off to not fight as a tourist attraction, but to do battle with the leader of the planet. They are betrayed by Brudas and the enemy is given their battle plan. Tetsuro gives this information to Zeda but the government is plotting an ambush...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Laboratory of Eternal War: Part Two
永久戦斗実験室 後編
